page.title: 16A QUESTION OF ENERGY
page.content: Of the houses surveyed all except one has mains electricity. There is no mains gas supply to the village. The results of our survey are as follows:- 1. What fuel do you use for cooking? Electric _ 38; Propane gas _ 5; Oil _ 4; Solid fuel _ 1. 2. What fuel do you use for heating water? Electric _ 5; Oil _ 6; Solid fuel_ 21; Combination of Oil/electric _ 4; Combination of Solid fuel/electric_ 12 3. Does the house have:_ a. Central heating? Yes - 26; No -22. b. Loft insulation? Yes - 35; No -13. c. Double glazing? Yes - 12; No -36. d. Cavity wall insulation? Yes - 3; No - 45. e. Solar panels? Yes - 1; No - 47.
